brief_title: Albumin-bound Paclitaxel and Carboplatin Versus Epirubicin and Docetaxel for Triple-negative Breast Cancer
drugs: ['Albumin-bound paclitaxel combined with carboplatin', 'Epirubicin combined with docetaxel']
brief_summary: To investigate the efficacy of albumin-bound paclitaxel combined with carboplatin versus epirubicin combined with docetaxel as neoadjuvant therapy for triple-negative breast cancer.
